items.text: length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
items.shortText: Jadhav to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: shot. Too slow, too short. Plenty of time to get back and slap it to the cover boundary
items.postText: Arpit: "Another wicket here and Bangladesh will be close to hitting the panic button. That is why you can never relax against India in middle overs. They know how to get back into the game out of nowhere."
items.shortText: Jadhav to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: full on leg stump, flicked to midwicket
items.shortText: Chahal to Liton Das, no run

items.text: length on off stump, pushed back down the pitch
items.shortText: Chahal to Liton Das, no run

items.text: full on off stump, gets down and loses some shape as he sweeps this. Gets it to deep square's left off the thick inside edge
items.postText: jahid: "I am happy that Mushi joined Liton in the crease. Hope he would guide him for a long innings. " --- Seemingly something he needs. This is his third-longest innings in all formats in 50 innings. Not a great picture.
items.shortText: Chahal to Liton Das, 2 runs

items.text: length on leg stump, tapped into the leg side
items.shortText: Chahal to Liton Das, no run

items.text: full outside off, looks to drive, gets it off the under-edge
items.postText: Ravneet: "It might worth a try to bring back Bumrah to get Mushfiqur. He is pretty solid against spin. " --- Averages 146 against spin in the Asia Cup
items.shortText: Chahal to Liton Das, no run

items.text: full on off stump, drives towards long-off but the bowler won't let it through
items.postText: AJ: "Arpit: just a reminder they were 12/3 in the last match and did not panic"
items.shortText: Chahal to Liton Das, no run

items.text: floated up at leg stump, gets to the pitch and flicks to long-on
items.shortText: Jadhav to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full on off stump, driven to long-on with the turn
items.shortText: Jadhav to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: length on off stump, pushed to square leg off the front foot
items.shortText: Jadhav to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: short and wide outside off, slapped to extra cover off the back foot
items.shortText: Jadhav to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: finds deep midwicket! Oh that's a poor shot from Mushfiqur. Half-tracker outside off. He's hit a similar ball through cover for a four last time round. This time he tries to clear the boundary on the leg side. That's a big boundary on that side and he has been caught some 10 yards in. The pull was on, but with Jadhav's slowness and lack of bounce, going aerial was ill-advised
items.shortText: Jadhav to Mushfiqur Rahim, OUT

dismissal.text: Mushfiqur Rahim c Bumrah b Jadhav 5 (9b 1x4 0x6) SR: 55.55

items.text: short outside off, punched to long-on off the back foot
items.postText: Neeraj Jha: "Gone to Jadhav. Pretty sure this would have done some good damage to that 140+ avg against spin in Asia cup of Mushy. That is if we consider KJ as a spinner. "
items.shortText: Jadhav to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket against the turn
items.shortText: Chahal to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: outside edge to short third man. Length ball drifted in at off, once again looks to drive without getting to the pitch
items.shortText: Chahal to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: full on off stump, driven to long-off
items.postText: Abhay S Rajput: "The best time to get a batsman out is when he is nearing a landmark or just completed it. Let's see if Indian team can take Liton out sooner than later!" --- Deep cover has come in. Will he take the bait? No one deep square on the off side
items.shortText: Chahal to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: googly on leg stump, met on the full but hit straight to midwicket
items.shortText: Chahal to Liton Das, no run

items.text: length on middle stump, turning away from him and he can't get the flick further than pitchside
items.shortText: Chahal to Liton Das, no run

items.text: run-out at the non-striker's end! This is chaos! Liton has belted a lovely drive that would have pierced the off-side ring if the fielder at extra cover wasn't Jadeja. He has gone flying to his left, despite a seemingly bad bounce that was making the ball rise, and collected cleanly. In the meantime, Liton has been ball-watching as Mithun has taken off. Jadeja is quickly back up, shapes to throw at the striker's end, but maintains his composure and stops. Finds the non-striker's end is the way to go and sends in a throw on the bounce. Stunning, stunning work. it's what you expect of him. But where was the calling from Liton?
items.shortText: Chahal to Liton Das, OUT

items.text: short of a length just outside off, tapped past the bowler
items.shortText: Jadhav to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: short ball outisde off, flicked to square leg
items.shortText: Jadhav to Liton Das, no run

items.text: nicely placed. Full ball outside off, gets low and sweeps aerially, flat, to the square leg boundary
items.shortText: Jadhav to Liton Das, FOUR runs

items.text: maiden century in international cricket for Liton Das. What a knock. He has look unperturbed and classy throughout the day. Length ball on middle and he's down the pitch to drive to long-on with calm
items.shortText: Jadhav to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: length on off stump, closes the face on this but it bobs back down the pitch
items.shortText: Jadhav to Mahmudullah, no run
